articles.author: Adam Morton
articles.title: Australia to face growing international pressure to improve 2030 emissions target - The Guardian
articles.description: Morrison government rejects direct calls for action from Britain, the US, Europe and Pacific nations at Cop26
articles.content: Pressure on the Australian government to lift its 2030 emissions target is expected to escalate and continue into next year, based on a document released by the British hosts at the Glasgow climate s… [+3570 chars]
